coursepicker

Class PickerDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • coursepicker.PickerDAO

  • public class PickerDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles database access for the Course Picker project

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.PreparedStatement addCourseStatement
      Represents the statement used to add a course to the CourseListing table

      Represents the statement used to add a course requirement to the Requirements table

      A reference to the Call Number of a course in the CourseListing table

      Represents the URL used to connect to the appropriate database

      Represents the statement used to list the courses in the CourseListing table

      Represents the statement used to list the requirements in the Requirements table for a course

      Represents the statement used to remove a course from the CourseListing table
      private java.sql.PreparedStatement removeRequirementStatement
      Represents the statement used to remove a requirement for a course from the Requirements table

      • getCourseID

        public java.lang.String getCourseID()

      • addCourse

        public void addCourse(java.lang.String callNumber,
             java.lang.String coursePrefix,
             java.lang.String courseNumber,
             java.lang.String courseTitle,
             java.lang.String instructorName,
             java.lang.String availability,
             int creditHrs,
             java.lang.String session,
             java.lang.String days,
             java.lang.String periodBegin,
             java.lang.String periodEnd,
             java.lang.String building,
             java.lang.String room)
        The method that will add a course to the CourseListing table in the database using the argument parameters provided below
        Parameters:
        callNumber - - String - the call number of the course
        coursePrefix - - String - the given prefix of the course
        courseNumber - - String - the number of the course
        courseTitle - - String - the title of the course
        instructorName - - String - the instructor's name for the course
        availability - - String - the current availability of the course
        creditHrs - - int - the number of credit hours for the course
        session - - String - the semester session of the course
        days - - String - the days the course will meet
        periodBegin - - String - the time the course will begin
        periodEnd - - String - the time the course will end
        building - - String - the building the course is offered in
        room - - String - the room the course is offered in

        Parameters:

      • addRequirement

        public void addRequirement(int requirementID,
                  java.lang.String coursePrefix,
                  java.lang.String courseNumber)
        The method that will add a requirement to the Requirements table in the database using the argument parameters provided below
        Parameters:
        requirementID - - int - the requirement the corresponding course satisfies
        coursePrefix - - String - the prefix of the corresponding course
        courseNumber - - String - the number of the corresponding course

      • getRequirementList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Requirement> getRequirementList()
        Gets the list of requirements (corresponding to courses) from the Requirements table in the database
        Returns:
        ArrayList

      • removeRequirement

        public void removeRequirement(int searchID)
        Removes the Requirement from the Requirements table in the database corresponding to the requirement id being searched
        Parameters:
        searchID - - int - the requirementID corresponding to the Requirement that is to be removed from the Requirements table in the database
